After eligibility confirm , participant schedule baseline visit , include vital signs/anthropometry , medical/medication history review , physical exam , blood draw , urine collection , bronchoscopy ( lavage brushing ) . Participants return 14-40 day baseline visit study treatment visit , include vital signs/anthropometry , blood draw , urine collection , spirometry , one-time administration ionic silver via nebulizer , instruction collect urine 24 hour . The next day study treatment visit , participant return visit include vital signs/anthropometry , blood draw , provide 24-hour urine sample , spirometry , bronchoscopy .
